mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author_id, author_name, created_at, updated_at, is_important, is_hidden, view_count FROM notice WHERE COALESCE(is_hidden, FALSE) = FALSE ORDER BY is_important DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, content, author_id, author_name, created_at, updated_at, is_important, is_hidden, view_count FROM notice ORDER BY is_important DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, content, author_id, author_name, created_at, updated_at, is_important, is_hidden, view_count FROM notice WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, content, author_id, author_name, created_at, updated_at, is_important, is_hidden, view_count FROM notice WHERE id = #{id} AND COALESCE(is_hidden, FALSE) = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (id, title, content, author_id, author_name, is_important, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{authorId}, #{authorName}, #{isImportant}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{notice.title}, content = #{notice.content}, updated_at = NOW(), is_important = #{notice.isImportant} WHERE id = #{notice.id} AND (author_id = #{actorId} OR author_id = #{actorUsername}) AND #{isAdmin} = FALSE
UPDATE notice SET is_hidden = TRUE, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND #{isAdmin} = TRUE AND COALESCE(is_hidden, FALSE) = FALSE
UPDATE notice SET is_hidden = FALSE, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND #{isAdmin} = TRUE AND COALESCE(is_hidden, FALSE) = TRUE
